title: Air Fryer Donut Holes With Lemon Glaze

Ingredients.5: 4 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, cut into small pieces

Ingredients.6: 0.25 cup whole milk, or more as needed

Directions.1: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Add butter and use a fork or pastry cutter to work butter into the flour mixture until it resembles coarse cornmeal.

Directions.2: Pour in milk and vanilla and combine until liquid is evenly distributed. Add additional milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dough does not come together. Knead dough for 1 to 2 minutes.

Directions.3: Preheat an air fryer to 320 degrees F (160 degrees C). Lightly spray the basket with cooking spray.

Directions.4: Divide dough into 12 equal portions and set 6 portions into the basket without touching. Lightly spray with cooking spray.

Directions.5: Air fry for 5 minutes, lightly spray again, then fry for an additional 2 minutes. Transfer donut holes to a wire rack and repeat with remaining 6 portions.

Directions.6: Stir confectioners' sugar and lemon juice together in a very small bowl until well mixed. Drizzle lemon glaze over the donut holes and serve warm.
